title: Movement - 🏛┃testnet-guide
html:
# Join us in Building The Parthenon 🏛️ :AAAAAAAA_1: 

# TL;DR
1️⃣ **Get Razor and/or Nightly wallets and connect them to Galxe:** https://movementlabs.notion.site/Parthenon-Wallets-Explained-69e088835d584b569ba487aa0d7e1f82
2️⃣ **Head to our Parthenon Testnet website:** https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz
3️⃣ **Check out the Paths to begin your journey:** https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz/guilds 
4️⃣ **Get testnet MOVE and mint tokens at the Faucet:** (hint: make to pick the network you want!) https://faucet.movementlabs.xyz/
5️⃣ **Need help with an app?** Check out **The Mother Of All Testnet App Guides (MOATAG):** https://movementlabs.notion.site/The-Mother-Of-All-Testnet-App-Guides-MOATAG-c9b85e1023414344ac68716875f413ee

**<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>**

Building the Parthenon is our community testnet experience. With this program you can help us **test out and improve our testnet** as well as help us **build our community for the long-term**. With your efforts and skills at work, **your reputation will rise** and your questing and **contributions will be recognized in very meaningful ways** 😉

Let's address the basics of Building The Parthenon 🤝 

👉  **How do I earn recognition in Building The Parthenon?**
- You earn **Resources** by completing Quests in each of the Guilds. More details about this coming soon!
- Our partners have created lots of quests, but remember **you do NOT need to complete all of them** to receive Resources! (https://testnet.movementlabs.xyz/resources)
- **SO, YOU ONLY HAVE TO COMPLETE 10% OF QUESTS IN ONE GUILD TO GAIN RECOGNITION **
- If you want to earn more in any of the Guilds, you can complete 10%, 25%, 50%, 75%, or 90% to earn recognition in our program!

👉  **What are the different Movement networks?**
- Movement is a novel L2 featuring the MoveVM that is integrated with other modular components like Celesitia for DA and Etherum for settlement
- One of our great strengths is the ability for projects written in Aptos Move, Sui Move, or Solidity/EVM to all run on Movement
- We are slowing integrating these together, but they currently exist as three separate netorks:
-- **The Movement Testnet (using Aptos Move)**
-- **The MEVM ("Move + EVM") devnet**
-- **The Sui Move devnet**
- Using these three networks during Building The Parthenon allows you to use apps deployed on Movement from all three languages/virtual machines
- But is does mean that you need to use an Aptos Move, Sui Move, or EVM wallet address depending on the network the app your'e playing with is deployed
- That leads us to the issue of multiple wallets... 👇

👉  **Which wallets should I use for testnet apps?**
Because apps that use Aptos Move, Sui Move, and EVM are on our testnet, you will need to use different addresses and potentially different wallets when testing out apps.
- Check out this explainer to guide your wallet setup: https://www.notion.so/movementlabs/Parthenon-Wallets-Explained-69e088835d584b569ba487aa0d7e1f82
- Support for more wallets will be coming in Galxe and in the apps on our testnet this week to make life easier for you!

👉  **What are the Guilds?**
- Learn more here https://movementlabs.notion.site/Welcome-to-the-Movement-Community-Program-98b9a1115b954e228b9907952ed04e5b
- Lean more about the **Paths of the Guilds** here https://movementlabs.notion.site/The-Paths-Of-The-Guilds-d5c27f7a90e947ee9c1c3e04f8f80718
